directions.text: Cut up vegetables and juice limes.
Cook the steaks (see steak on stove recipe).
Drizzle 2 TBSP lime on steaks, wrap with foil and set for 10 mins.
Heat oil in a skillet on medium heat and let smoke.
Add all vegetables and chili powder then cook for 5 mins.
Add rest of lime juice to vegetables and turn off heat.
Cut steak into tiny pieces and throw into vegetables.
Heat tortillas in microwave for 30 seconds.
